definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: She's neurotic about switching lights off at home to save eletricity .

sentences.english: She always projects her own neuroses onto her colleagues.
sentences.chinese: 她總是將自己的神經病投射到她的同事身上。

sentences.english: Conclusion Speech training really has good effects on this child with auditory neuropathy .
sentences.chinese: 結論該聽神經病聾兒的言語訓練有確切的效果。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical significance of single fiber electromyography in diabetic peripheral neuropathy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討單纖維肌電圖在糖尿病周圍神經病中的應用。

sentences.english: There is a neuropathy beside me , whenever I speak to you, he is the first to answer.
sentences.chinese: 我旁邊有個神經病，每次我和你說話，他都搶着回答。

sentences.english: A couple of apples a day may keep the neurologist away.
sentences.chinese: 每天喫幾個蘋果就能讓你遠離神經病醫生。

sentences.english: Google filed two letters to me the whole ad, and neuropathy.
sentences.chinese: 申請了兩個谷歌廣告全給我封了，神經病。

sentences.english: I went upstairs and chewed, an unlucky year, touch on a pair of neuropathy.
sentences.chinese: 我邊上樓邊狠狠地罵，流年不利，碰上一對神經病。

sentences.english: And my only patient will be some wacko who runs a library.
sentences.chinese: 我唯一的病人就是那個開圖書館的神經病。

sentences.english: Neuropathy people think wide, mentally retarded children more than joy .
sentences.chinese: 神經病人思維廣，弱智兒童歡樂多。

sentences.english: They came to see one, they all thought had neuropathy.
sentences.chinese: 他們跑來一看，都以爲他倆得了神經病。

sentences.english: Dercum, a neurologist from Philadelphia, who also attended the president, ordered his notes destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 醫生，費城神經病學家，也給總統看過病。

sentences.english: Neuropathological examination was conducted in more than half of the clinically examined subjects.
sentences.chinese: 對一半以上臨牀檢查對象進行了神經病理檢查。

sentences.english: I felt like I was sick.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得我就像得了神經病。

sentences.english: You are simply not in your right mind.
Neurotics build castles in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 神經病在空中修建城堡。

to play a joke/to make fun of/to joke
